summary: Changes Movarth\'s boots from hide armor to the Dawnguard\'s Vampire Boots model
descriptionHtml:
After the release of Dawnguard, I went over to Movarth\'s cave to see if he was updated. He was, but the boots next to his bed weren\'t. I liked the enchantment they offered, but I\'ve never been partial to hide armor. I looked on the Steamworkshop and Skyrim Nexus and couldn\'t find any mods that changed the models, so I did it myself.

Requires Dawnguard
author: Levowitz
